onboarding_welcome_subtitle: Your comprehensive companion through your pregnancy journey.
onboarding_due_date_subtitle: This helps us provide you with the most relevant information and track your pregnancy journey.
onboarding_feature_item1_description: Access reliable pregnancy information anytime, anywhere.
onboarding_feature_item3_description: Track your pregnancy progress with useful tools.
no_results_found: No results found. Try different keywords.
due_date_calculator_prompt: When did your last menstrual period start?
kick_counter_description: Tap the button when you feel a kick. Try to count 10 kicks and time how long it takes.
milestone_message_week4: Your baby is now the size of a poppy seed. The amniotic sac forms.
milestone_message_week8: Your baby is now the size of a raspberry. All essential organs have begun to form!
milestone_message_week12: Your baby is now the size of a lime. The baby's reflexes are developing!
milestone_message_week16: Your baby is now the size of an avocado. You might start feeling the baby move!
milestone_message_week20: Halfway there! Your baby is now the size of a banana. You might have your anatomy scan soon.
milestone_message_week24: Your baby is now the size of an ear of corn. Your baby's face is fully formed!
milestone_message_week28: Your baby is now the size of an eggplant. The baby can open their eyes!
milestone_message_week32: Your baby is now the size of a squash. The baby is practicing breathing!
milestone_message_week36: Your baby is now the size of a head of romaine lettuce. The baby is getting ready for birth!
milestone_message_week40: Your baby is now the size of a small pumpkin. You're at your due date!
offline_warning: You are offline. Some features may not be available.
